pr_title: Added Pipeline to run TCK's with JDK 11

timeline.message: Added Pipeline to run TCK's with JDK 11.

timeline.bodyText: You can drop the underlines here
timeline.author: gastaldi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -175,7 +175,7 @@ stages:
               jdk: '1.12'
           - template: prepare-cache.yaml
 
-      - job: Run_TCKs
+      - job: Run_JDK8_TCKs

replies.bodyText: It is following the other job names structure. Should we just name this RunJDK8TCKs and the other `RunJDK11TCKs'?
replies.author: radcortez
